verbs.description: While President Trump ’s weekend Twitter assertion that “ [ARG0: Germany] [V: owes] [ARG1: vast sums of money] [ARG2: to NATO] ” is disputed by experts – and by Berlin – it draws attention to the fact that Germany , like the majority of the 28 members of the alliance , has yet to meet a NATO - agreed commitment to devote two percent of GDP to defense spending .
